signup.title: Welcome to Inova!
signup.description: Register now and start your adventure.

form.title: Check Your Inbox
form.description: We have sent you an email to verify your account. Please check your inbox.
form.agreeToTerms: Please agree to the terms and conditions!
form.checkEmail: Check your email to verify your account

signupVerify.title: Signup Verify | Inova
signupVerify.verifyEmailDescription: We'll verify your email address now!
signupVerify.verifyingEmailDescription: Please wait till we verify your email address.
signupVerify.emailVerifiedDescription: Email verification successful. Soon you will be redirected to login page.
